item.title: Spotify每月用户数量低于预期，原因是促销活动减少
item.description: Spotify 周二公布的季度月活跃用户数（MAU）为 6.15 亿，低于自己的预期，原因是这家瑞典音乐流媒体公司为吸引更多听众而减少了营销活动的支出。【原文：Spotify on Tuesday reported quarterly monthly active users (MAU) of 615 million, missing its own estimates, as the Swedish music streaming company spent less on marketing activities to draw in more listeners.】

item.title: 劳动力成本高企，小包装需求疲软，导致 UPS 利润下降
item.description: 美国联合包裹服务公司（United Parcel Service）周二报告称，第一季度利润下降，原因是小包裹递送需求低迷，以及与卡车司机工会（Teamsters union）签订的新劳动合同导致成本上升，从而给利润率带来压力。【原文：United Parcel Service reported a decline in first-quarter profit on Tuesday, as margins came under pressure from subdued demand for small-package delivery and higher costs tied to a new labor contract with the Teamsters union.】

item.title: 百事可乐公司因提价和需求稳定，季度收入超出预期
item.description: 百事公司周二公布的第一季度营收超出华尔街预期，原因是该汽水和零食巨头的 Tropicana 果汁和 Cheetos 在国际市场上的需求保持稳定。【原文：PepsiCo beat Wall Street expectations for first-quarter revenue on Tuesday as demand held steady for the soda and snacks giant's Tropicana juices and Cheetos in its international markets.】

item.title: 早间竞购特斯拉业绩下滑，欧洲业务表现出色
item.description: Mike Dolan 展望美国和全球市场的未来一天【原文：A look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets from Mike Dolan】

item.title: 亚马逊在美国推出低成本杂货配送订阅计划
item.description: 电子商务巨头亚马逊公司周二在美国推出了一项新的食品杂货配送服务，面向其 Prime 计划的会员和享受政府食品援助福利的客户。【原文：Ecommerce giant Amazon.com launched a new grocery delivery subscription on Tuesday in the United States for members of its Prime program and customers who are recipients of the government food assistance benefits.】

item.title: 企业财报公布前，期货价格走高
item.description: 美国股指期货周二小幅上涨，原因是一些成长股和芯片股上涨，同时市场参与者为本周繁忙的季度财报做准备，这些财报可能有助于衡量美国企业的健康状况。【原文：U.S. stock index futures rose marginally on Tuesday as some growth and chip stocks gained, while market participants geared up for a busy week of quarterly earnings that could help gauge the health of America's corporates.】

item.title: Adobe 今年将为 Photoshop 带来全面的人工智能图像生成功能
item.description: Adobe 公司周二表示，计划今年晚些时候在其 Photoshop 软件中加入一个完全人工智能图像生成工具。【原文：Adobe said on Tuesday it plans to place a tool for full artificial intelligence image generation in its Photoshop software later this year.】

item.title: 摩根大通中国任命中国投资银行部新主管
item.description: 据路透社查阅公司备忘录并经公司发言人证实，摩根大通银行任命卢方为其中国投资银行部董事会主席，接替前任主席朴普。【原文：JPMorgan Chase & Co appoints Lu Fang to chair the board of its China investment banking arm, replacing former chair Park Pu, according to a company memo reviewed by Reuters and confirmed by a company spokesperson.】

item.title: 特斯拉股价在季度业绩公布前走高
item.description: 周二，特斯拉股价在这家电动汽车制造商发布第一季度财报前走高，分析师预计其毛利率将创六年多来最低。【原文：Shares of Tesla edged higher on Tuesday ahead of the electric car maker's first-quarter results, with analysts expecting its lowest gross profit margin in more than six years.】

item.title: 瑞银获得挪威财富基金对资本计划和埃尔莫蒂薪酬的支持
item.description: 挪威主权财富基金支持瑞银的一项计划，即通过保护其一级附加债券（AT1）免于全军覆没，使其对投资者更具吸引力，该基金还签署了瑞银首席执行官塞尔吉奥-埃尔莫蒂（Sergio Ermotti）的薪酬方案。【原文：Norway's sovereign wealth fund has backed UBS' plan to make its Additional Tier 1 (AT1) bonds, a form of debt, more appealing to investors by protecting them from a wipeout, and also signed off on UBS CEO Sergio Ermotti's pay package.】

item.title: 苹果手机第一季度在华销量下降 19.1%，华为增长 70
item.description: 2024 年第一季度，苹果公司的智能手机销量下降了 19.1%，而竞争对手华为公司（HWT.UL）的销量增长了 69.1%，这表明美国公司在全球最大智能手机市场高端领域的主导地位正受到越来越大的威胁。【原文：Apple's smartphone sales declined by 19.1% in the first quarter of 2024, while rival Huawei's (HWT.UL) grew by 69.1%, signaling an increasing threat to the U.S. firm's dominance in the high-end segment of the world's largest smartphone market.】

item.title: 美元之王带来最大痛苦
item.description: 强劲的经济、持续的通胀和地缘政治紧张局势推动美元飙升，令从东京到北京和斯德哥尔摩的政策制定者感到不安。【原文：A dollar surge propelled by a strong economy, sticky inflation and geopolitical tensions have unnerved policymakers from Tokyo to Beijing and Stockholm.】

item.title: 微软推出小型人工智能模型
item.description: 微软周二发布了一款经济高效的小语种人工智能模型，它可以执行内容创建和创建社交媒体帖子等任务，同时使用较少的数据量。【原文：Microsoft on Tuesday announced a cost-effective, small language artificial intelligence model that can perform tasks such as content creation and create social media posts while using smaller amounts of data.】

item.title: 德国 4 月份商业活动恢复增长，PMI 调查显示
item.description: 周二的一项初步调查显示，在德国服务业活动稳健增长的推动下，德国私营部门在 4 月份意外恢复了增长。【原文：Germany's private sector unexpectedly returned to growth in April, driven by a solid rise in activity in the country’s service sector, a preliminary survey showed on Tuesday.】

item.title: 日本电产受重组成本影响出现季度亏损
item.description: 日本电机制造商日本电产周二公布了 1 月至 3 月的运营亏损，原因是为应对中国电动汽车市场激烈的价格竞争而采取的重组措施产生了成本。【原文：Japanese electric motor maker Nidec on Tuesday posted an operating loss for the January to March quarter, hit by the costs of restructuring steps taken to deal with fierce price competition in China's electric vehicle market.】

item.title: 英国零售商 JD Sports 将以 10.8 亿美元收购美国竞争对手 Hibbett
item.description: 随着英国体育用品零售商在美国东南部的扩张，JD Sports Fashion 公司周二表示，拟以约 10.8 亿美元的价格收购美国运动时尚零售商 Hibbett Inc。【原文：JD Sports Fashion has proposed to buy American athletic-fashion retailer Hibbett Inc for about $1.08 billion, the companies said on Tuesday, as the British sportswear retailer expands across the southeastern U.S.】

item.title: 日本 7-Eleven 便利连锁店瞄准积极的全球增长
item.description: 日本零售巨头 Seven & i 控股公司周二表示，希望其 7-Eleven 连锁便利店在全球范围内取得巨大增长，并将加快进入欧洲、拉丁美洲、中东和非洲市场的步伐。【原文：Japanese retail giant Seven & i Holdings said on Tuesday it wanted to see huge growth for its 7-Eleven convenience store chain globally, and would be accelerating its entry into Europe, Latin America, the Middle East and Africa.】

item.title: 越南 FPT 将投资 2 亿美元建设使用英伟达芯片的人工智能工厂
item.description: 越南顶级科技公司 FPT 和 Nvidia 周二表示，两家公司计划利用 Nvidia 的图形芯片和软件建造一座耗资 2 亿美元的人工智能（AI）工厂。【原文：Vietnam's top tech firm FPT plans to build a $200 million artificial intelligence (AI) factory using Nvidia's graphics chips and software, the two firms said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 雷诺第一季度销量增长 1.8
item.description: 法国汽车制造商雷诺周二称，其第一季度收入增长了 1.8%，融资业务的良好表现抵消了核心汽车销售营业额的下降。【原文：French car maker Renault said on Tuesday its first-quarter revenue grew 1.8%, with good performance in its financing business offsetting a drop in turnover in core automotive sales.】

item.title: 国际能源署称电动汽车销量将增长，但经济承受能力是重点
item.description: 国际能源署（IEA）周二预测，尽管一些市场存在经济逆风，但2024年电动汽车销量仍将强劲增长，但经济承受能力和充电基础设施将是未来增长的关键。【原文：Electric car sales will rise strongly in 2024 despite economic headwinds in some markets, the International Energy Agency (IEA) forecast on Tuesday, but affordability and charging infrastructure will be key to future growth.】

item.title: 早间竞价关注采购经理人指数，寻找反弹迹象
item.description: Tom Westbrook 展望欧洲和全球市场的未来一天【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Tom Westbrook】

item.title: 招标书显示，中国最近在超微和戴尔服务器中收购了被禁用的英伟达芯片
item.description: 中国的大学和研究机构最近通过转售商获得了高端的英伟达人工智能芯片，尽管美国去年扩大了对华销售此类技术的禁令。【原文：Chinese universities and research institutes recently obtained high-end Nvidia artificial intelligence chips through resellers, despite the U.S. widening a ban last year on the sale of such technology to China.】

item.title: 监管机构称 Blackstone 旗下的皇冠度假酒店可保留悉尼赌场执照
item.description: 博彩监管机构周二表示，经过近三年的强化整治，Blackstone 旗下的皇冠度假村（Crown Resorts）被认定适合保留其悉尼赌场的执照。【原文：Blackstone-owned Crown Resorts was found suitable to retain its Sydney casino's licence after nearly three years of intensive remediation, a gambling regulator said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 亚洲股市在科技股财报公布前扩大涨幅，日元走势脆弱
item.description: 周二，亚洲股市延续涨势，从华尔街的走势中得到启示，市场焦点转向本周美国科技巨头的财报。【原文：Asian shares extended gains on Tuesday, taking cues from Wall Street as focus shifts to earnings results from U.S. tech giants in the week, while a still strong dollar pressured the Japanese yen to fresh 34-year lows.】

item.title: 日本央行行长上田表示：如果趋势性通胀加速，日本央行将加息
item.description: 日本央行行长上田一夫（Kazuo Ueda）表示，如果趋势性通胀如预期般加速向2%的目标迈进，日本央行将再次加息，这使市场对日本央行今年晚些时候进一步撤出货币支持的预期得以保持。【原文：The Bank of Japan will raise interest rates again if trend inflation accelerates toward its 2% target as expected, governor Kazuo Ueda said, keeping alive market expectations of a further withdrawal of monetary support later this year.】

item.title: 韩国经济可能在第一季度实现稳定增长：路透社民意调查
item.description: 路透社对经济学家进行的一项调查显示，由于出口的增长抵消了家庭消费的疲软，韩国经济上个季度可能增长了 0.6%，保持了与前三个月相同的扩张速度。【原文：South Korea's economy likely grew 0.6% last quarter, maintaining the same pace of expansion as in the previous three months, as improving exports offset weakening household consumption, a Reuters poll of economists found.】

item.title: 美元坚挺拖累日元向干预区间靠拢
item.description: 周二，美元坚挺使日元汇率锁定在34年新低附近，投资者在展望本周关键的美国通胀报告和日本央行利率决定时，不得不加强干预观察。【原文：A firm U.S. dollar had the yen locked near a fresh 34-year low on Tuesday, keeping investors on heightened intervention watch as they looked ahead to key U.S. inflation report and the Bank of Japan's rate decision this week.】

item.title: 石油在亚洲早盘交易中上涨，中东紧张局势仍是焦点
item.description: 周二亚市早盘，油价走高，扭转了上一交易日的跌势，原因是投资者继续评估中东地缘政治忧虑带来的风险。【原文：Oil prices edged higher in early Asian trading on Tuesday, reversing losses from the previous session, as investors continued to assess the risk from geopolitical concerns in the Middle East.】

item.title: 日本制造业采购经理人指数（PMI）显示日本工厂活动下降缓慢
item.description: 周二的一项商业调查显示，日本 4 月份的工厂活动出现萎缩，但已接近盈亏平衡点，这表明这一关键行业在经历了数月的低迷之后终于开始回暖。【原文：Japan's factory activity contracted but approached the break-even point in April, a business survey showed on Tuesday, suggesting the key sector is finally picking up after months of sluggishness.】

item.title: ADM首席财务官因公司面临美国政府调查而辞职
item.description: 谷物贸易商 Archer-Daniels-Midland 周一表示，首席财务官 Vikram Luthar 将于 9 月 30 日辞职。【原文：Grain trader Archer-Daniels-Midland said on Monday that Chief Financial Officer Vikram Luthar will resign from his role effective Sept. 30.】
